tldr: 本论文提出了一种计算高效且强大的贝叶斯方法，用于拟合和推断稀疏高维线性回归模型，能减少对参数的先验假设，并用参数扩展期望-条件-最大化算法完成了最大后验概率估计，E步采用受流行的两组多重检验方法启发的方法。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a computationally efficient and powerful Bayesian approach for fitting and inferring on sparse high-dimensional linear regression models. The method reduces prior assumptions on parameters through the use of plug-in empirical Bayes estimates and employs the Parameter-Expanded Expectation-Conditional-Maximization algorithm for efficient maximum a posteriori estimation. The E-step is completed using an approach motivated by the popular two-groups approach to multiple testing. The result is a Partitioned empirical Bayes Ecm algorithm applied to sparse high-dimensional linear regression.
